item.description:
Join us for a few more indoor activities before we do outdoor activities as we enter into spring. Bowling is a very fun and exciting sport....especially if you can beat Steve Wong! we will bowl first, afterward may get some dinner around the area. hope you can join us. sorry for the short notice.

Price: $5.25 a game per person, shoe rental $4.25

for more information about Boston, please go to http://www.bostonbowl...


Susan
item.why: fun indoor activity while outside still cold

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: bowling
